roleset.name: create (beer)
roleset.note: BREW-V NOTES: Corresponds to VN class preparing-26.3-1 (from brew.01-v)

example.name: literal!
example.text: Although imports account for less than 1% of beer sales in Japan, [Asahi Breweries Ltd., which has been gaining share with its popular dry beer]-3, plans *trace* to fend off Japanese competitors by *trace* pouring $1.06 billion into facilities *trace*-3 to brew 50% more beer.

example.name: this will occur eventually
example.text: John knew that trouble was brewing.
